display_all_days_desc: Show every day of the week
manage_hidden_event_desc: Delete filter(s) used to hide events
accent_color_desc: Color of buttons and some texts
note_color_desc: Color of indicator if a note is present
generate_event_color_text: All event will have a color
logout_confirm: Are you really sure you want to disconnect?
about_what: This app is linked to the agenda of the University of Le Mans, Tours and Rennes. It allow you to have direct access to your calendar on your device without having to connect to the ENT.
author: Author
add_note_store: Please note the app on the store.
changelog_desc: See the changelog of the app
intro_welcome_desc: MyAgenda allows you to access to your calendar of your University, directly on your device!
intro_login_desc: Calendars are reserved to students, so you must login. Select your university and enter the same credentials you use for the ENT.
intro_agenda_desc: In the settings, you can choose your campus, department, year and group to display the corresponding calendar.
intro_customization_desc: Choose light or dark theme but also the colors of the app! Make it unique with 35 720 combinations.
intro_note_desc: You can add notes on a course. An indicator will appear on the side, it is also customizable in the settings.
intro_event_desc: You can add your own event to the calendar and give it a special color. For example: An appointment with a teacher.
intro_offline_desc: Once your calendar has been loaded at least once, it will be backed up for offline use.
require_field: You must fill the text field.
error_end_time_text: The end time must be after the start time. Note that MyAgenda does not yet support multi-day events.
confirm_event_delete_text: By deleting this event, you will can't get it back.
findschedules_noresult_text: No empty schedules were found, try changing the search times.
courses_noresult_text: Try to edit number of weeks in settings.
help_noresult_text:
Check your internet connection.
It's also possible that the server is down.
network_error: Network error! Check your internet connection.
login_credential_error: It looks like the username or password is incorrect!
login_successfull_text:
A default group has been assigned to you.
You can change this one in the application settings.
no_email_app:
No email client :/
Please install email app like Gmail.
change_agenda_text: Do you want to change your actual agenda ?
supportme_text:
Do you want to reward all the work done to achieve and maintain MyAgenda?

You can give me a PayPal donation or without paying any pennies, register on Unidays with my referral link.

Info: Unidays allows unlimited discounts on many sites (Apple, Cdiscount, Fnac, Darty, ASSOS, etc. ..).

Thank you.
supportme_link_error:
Can not open the {site} website...
Link:
error_event_recurrent_zero: You select recurrent event but there is no day selected!
error_json_parse: Error processing JSON, contact us to solve the problem!
data_privacy_text:
MyAgenda uses the services offered by Universities in a transparent way, no confidential data like your username and password are stored or recovered by someone.

Only preference data is stored on your device (such as university, campus, group, chosen colors, events or added notes) so you can return them to the next launch of the application or offline mode.
file_404:
The .ics file could not be found !
Check the entered url.
wrong_ics_format: The .ics file has an incorrect format !
custom_event_exit_unsaved_text: You have not saved your changes, they will be lost!
error_univ_list_retrieve_fail: Impossible to retrieve university list, retry.
error_res_list_retrieve_fail: Impossible to retrieve agenda resources, retry.
hide_event_text: Are you sure you want to hide this event and all others with the same title?
unhide_event_text: Are you sure you want to set visible this event and all others with the same title?
no_hidden_event_text:
There is no added filter to hide events.
You can hide an event from the event's page or directly here.
get_calendars_failed: Can not retrieve the list of your calendars!
add_to_calendar_failed: Error adding the event to your {agenda} calendar.
